thread.section_title: Crazy Factory Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Crazy Factory | www.crazy-factory.com
thread.title: Sophia Adkins
thread.title_full: Crazy Factory bewertet von Sophia Adkins

author: Sophia Adkins
title: Sophia Adkins
text: Crazy Factory basically stole my money and are now ignorning every one of my emails. I ordered 2 weeks ago and for 3 days I've been trying to contact them. Website says Monday-Friday they're available and 24 hours max before they respond and it's been 3 days and I have gotten nothomg from them. There isn't even a way to track your package online for them so I have no idea where my package is, no way of finding it, and questioning if this is even a real site. They took my payment and I got nothing.
